alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau and Duval Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baymeadows, or near Arlington, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows and Cisco Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
